titleInfo.title: Side of Beef to be Given Away at VFW Post 1970 Layout (19372)

mods.abstract: One color window card (red on brown) that says "Side of Beef to be Given Away" on December 16 at V. F. W. Post 1970. To see the business record associated with this poster layout, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/41481/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
